channel.title: Staff cannot be banned? Please help!
channel.description: Hey guys as you can see in my name im not a good coder. So, how could I make it so that player rights 3, 2, and 1 cannot be banned unless a figure higher than them bans them. but someone with the same player rights cant ban eachother? Example: [b]I'll make a little table for you.[/b] 1's cannot ban 1's 2's or 3's 2's cannot ban 2's or 3's but can ban 1's 3's can ban anyone except the main owner. How could I do this? Please help

item.title: Staff cannot be banned? Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Hey guys as you can see in my name im not a good coder. So, how could I make it so that player rights 3, 2, and 1 cannot be banned unless a figure higher than them bans them. but someone with the same player rights cant ban eachother? Example:
I’ll make a little table for you.
1’s cannot ban 1’s 2’s or 3’s
2’s cannot ban 2’s or 3’s but can ban 1’s
3’s can ban anyone except the main owner.
How could I do this? Please help

Read full topic
item.source: Staff cannot be banned? Please help!
